mapper.update:
update TS_PTL_USER
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESI_PROV = #{resiProv,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESI_CITY = #{resiCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESI_DIST = #{resiDist,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOGIN_TIME = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ_NUM = #{qqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSN_NUM = #{msnNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CELLPHONE = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTRO_INFO = #{introInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_COUNT = #{loginCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REGISTER_TIME = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_MOBILE_CLIENT = #{isMobileClient,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where PTL_USER_ID = #{ptlUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TS_PTL_USER set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESI_PROV = #{resiProv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESI_CITY = #{resiCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESI_DIST = #{resiDist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOGIN_TIME = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ_NUM = #{qqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSN_NUM = #{msnNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CELLPHONE = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTRO_INFO = #{introInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_COUNT = #{loginCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REGISTER_TIME = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_MOBILE_CLIENT = #{isMobileClient,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where PTL_USER_ID = #{ptlUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
